name: Senwell Head & Beard Shampoo, 400 ML
description:
Experience the ultimate care for your hair and beard with Senwell Head & Beard Shampoo. Specially formulated for silky, shiny, and healthy hair, this 2-in-1 shampoo:
Restores Growth & Repair – Strengthens roots and prevents breakage.
Enhances Shine & Softness – Leaves hair smooth, silky, and manageable.
Hydrating & Anti-Dandruff Formula – Hydrates each wash and keeps scalp healthy.
Natural & Gentle Ingredients – Enriched with Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, and Essential Oils for nourishment and smoothness.
Perfect for all hair types, this shampoo is designed for daily use to maintain your hair’s natural luster while keeping your beard soft, healthy, and manageable. Free from alcohol and harsh SLS, it is gentle on the skin and hair.
Volume: 400 ML
